title: 20's Era Typeface
content: Looks a bit like [Poor Richard](http://web.archive.org/web/20050515204043/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/poor-richard-rr/), but you should also check out Nick Curtis's [Type Oasis](http://web.archive.org/web/20050515204043/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/curtis/pages/a.htm) for ideas, he has a lot in this vein.
author: pattyfab

comments.content: The font is Parsons, but Nick Curtis has a version he called [Parsnip](http://web.archive.org/web/20050515204043/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/parsnip-nf/) that is almost the same. It's not one of his freebies, though.
